---
title: "About this blog"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

Welcome to our blog! Here you'll find the latest news, insights, and examples of doing deep learning (using [torch](https://github.com/mlverse/torch), [TensorFlow](https://github.com/rstudio/tensorflow) and [Keras](https://github.com/rstudio/keras)), distributed computing and ML automation (using [sparklyr](https://github.com/sparklyr/sparklyr) and [mlflow](https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow)), and data ingestion (with [pins](https://github.com/rstudio/pins)) from R.

We also like to draw from a wide variety of contributors (so please consider submitting a post if so motivated!). Here is an alphabetic list of authors so far:

If you are interested in publishing some of your own work or insights on the RStudio AI Blog, we'd love to hear from you! See the article on [contributing posts](contributing.html) for additional details.
